bibl.title: Telegram from Sidney Coe Howard to John J. Moran, January 22, 1932

div1.p: Howard writes that he will meet Moran in Havana.

div1.head: Telegram from Sidney Coe Howard to John J. Moran, January 22, 1932
div1.opener:
Form 1289-HV
WESTERN UNION
CABLEGRAMA
NEWCOMB CARLTON, PRESIDENT
J. C. WILLEVER, FIRST VICE-PRESIDENT
__________________________________________________
Recibido en la Habana: Pi y Margall (Obispo) 69-71-73, esquina a Habana.
1932 JAN 22 PM 9 50
CDA680 CD NEW YORK 27 22
NLT JOHN J MORAN= SUNACO HAVANA=
div1.p:
STARTING TONIGHT DUE HAVANA SUNDAY MORNING BY MIAMI PLANE
IF FREE SUNDAY PLEASE LEAVE WORD BILTMORE WHERE CAN REACH
YOU=
